MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:45pm due to faulty electrical equipment located at 519 Great Western Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:39pm on Saturday, 23 January 2021
